mapper.select:
SELECT EZC_DETAIL_CD.MASTER_CD AS masterCd /* 공통 코드, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_CD AS detailCd /* 상세 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD AS classCd /* 분류 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_NM AS detailNm /* 상세 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DETAIL_CD /* 공통 코드 정보 */ ,EZC_CLASS_CD /* 공통 분류 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD = EZC_CLASS_CD.CLASS_CD
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.MASTER_CD = #{masterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공통 코드, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_DETAIL_CD_PK(P),SYS_C0011381(C) */ AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD = #{classCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 분류 코드, VARCHAR2(4), FK_EZC_CLASS_CD_EZC_DETAIL_CD(R),SYS_C0011383(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DETAIL_CD /* 공통 코드 정보 */ ,EZC_CLASS_CD /* 공통 분류 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD = EZC_CLASS_CD.CLASS_CD
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.MASTER_CD = #{masterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공통 코드, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_CD = #{detailCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD = #{classCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 분류 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_NM = #{detailNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 명, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_DETAIL_CD.MASTER_CD AS masterCd /* 공통 코드, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_CD AS detailCd /* 상세 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD AS classCd /* 분류 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_NM AS detailNm /* 상세 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DETAIL_CD /* 공통 코드 정보 */ ,EZC_CLASS_CD /* 공통 분류 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD = EZC_CLASS_CD.CLASS_CD
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.MASTER_CD = #{masterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공통 코드, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_CD = #{detailCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.CLASS_CD = #{classCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 분류 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.DETAIL_NM = #{detailNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 명, VARCHAR2(50) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DETAIL_CD.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_DETAIL_CD.MASTER_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DETAIL_CD SET /* 공통 코드 정보 */ DETAIL_CD = #{detailCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,DETAIL_NM = #{detailNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 상세 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND MASTER_CD = #{masterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공통 코드, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CLASS_CD = #{classCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 분류 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DETAIL_CD /* 공통 코드 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND MASTER_CD = #{masterCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 공통 코드, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND CLASS_CD = #{classCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 분류 코드, VARCHAR2(4) */
